start.say: Hello, this is Alex with Health America. How are you doing today?

reason_for_call.say: The reason I’m calling is to follow up on the health information we sent you. Did you get that okay?

hotline_offer.say: I understand you’d like customer service. You can reach our dedicated support line at 1-866-379-5131. Would you like me to help with something here first, or would you prefer to call them directly?

qualify_start.say: Let me ask you a few quick questions to better understand your health.

qualify_q1.say: Do you have arthritis or joint stiffness?

qualify_q2.say: On a scale of 1 to 10, what’s your pain today?

qualify_q3.say: If you don’t mind me asking, how old are you?

product_pitch.say: Based on what you’ve shared, the best fit is {{primary_product}}. It supports {{primary_benefits}}. Many customers also add {{upsell_product}} for {{upsell_benefits}}.

trial_close.say: That sounds like exactly what you’re looking for, doesn’t it?

offer_choice.say: Would you like the single bottle or the value pack that saves more per bottle?

responses.price: I completely understand — health is an investment. I can offer up to 15% off today. No shipping or taxes.
responses.trust: Health America has been trusted nationwide for years, ships from the U.S., and is covered by our money-back guarantee.
responses.delay: I respect that. But today’s discount and bonus gift are only available now. You’re fully covered by our guarantee.

shipping_address.say: Can I have your shipping address, please?

billing_same.say: Is your billing address the same as your shipping address?

payment_capture.say: Which card would you like to use?

confirm_order.say: Your order is confirmed. No shipping, no taxes, discount locked in. Thank you for choosing Health America — you’re going to love the results. If you ever need assistance, call our support line at 1-866-379-5131.

end_conversation.say: Thank you for your time today. You can reach us anytime at 1-866-379-5131.
